overrides.initial-setup:
## Steps
1. Run git-diff-lines.
2. Review ONLY changed lines.
overrides.focus-areas:
## What to Find
- Bugs/errors
- Logic issues
- Security vulnerabilities
- Performance problems
- Praise for good practices
overrides.available-commands:
## Commands (read-only)
Use: git-diff-lines, `cat -n`, ls, find, rg. Do NOT modify files.
overrides.diff-instructions:
## Line Numbers (old_or_new)
- "NEW": added [+] lines and context
- "OLD": deleted [-] lines only
Default to NEW if unclear.
overrides.guidelines:
## Guidelines
- High confidence only; skip uncertain issues
- Prefer line-level comments
- Prioritize changed lines
- Praise: omit suggestion field; Others: include actionable fix
